newsDescription: "Mr. Adeeb Ahamed, CEO, Lulu Exchange being presented the “Global Business Man of the Year” award at the Brand Icons Awards held in Thiruvananthapuram in Kerala by Mr. T. M. Thomas Isaac, Minister of Finance, Kerala”
items.caption: Latest from our News Room
